.exit
npx hardhat run scripts/verify-contracts.js --network localhost
echo 'const fundDistribution = await ethers.getContractAt("FundDistribution", "0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3"); console.log("FundDistribution contract address:", await fundDistribution.getAddress()); const zkSyncArtistManager = await ethers.getContractAt("ZkSyncArtistManager", "0xe7f1725E7734CE288F8367e1Bb143E90bb3F0512"); console.log("ZkSyncArtistManager contract address:", await zkSyncArtistManager.getAddress()); process.exit()' | npx hardhat console --network localhost
